message.content:
To solve this task, I need to identify the line item that represents the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid in the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 43168.61. This is exactly what we're looking for, as "Tax Payable" represents tax accrued but not yet paid.

A positive value in this line means there was an increase in the tax payable (more tax accrued than was paid), which is what the task is asking for.

Therefore, the value for the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid is 43168.61.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '43168.61'}}
```
